title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled Vue.js developer to build modern SPAs. Experience with Vue 3, Composition API, and modern JavaScript is required. You will work on exciting projects and collaborate with a talented team.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design beautiful and intuitive user interfaces for web and mobile apps. You will create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs. Experience with Figma, Sketch, or Adobe Creative Suite is required.

title: Marketing Specialist
description: Drive user growth through SEO, content, and paid campaigns. You will develop marketing strategies, create content, and analyze performance metrics to optimize campaigns.

title: Backend Developer
description: Build scalable backend services using Node.js and Python. You will work on microservices architecture, database design, and API development.

title: Sales Representative
description: Generate new business opportunities and manage client relationships. You will be responsible for prospecting, qualifying leads, and closing deals.

title: Customer Support Specialist
description: Provide exceptional customer support through various channels. You will troubleshoot technical issues, answer questions, and ensure customer satisfaction.
